app.name: DutyDash
app.description: Look up current tariff rates for US imports. Enter an HS code or search by product description, select the origin country, and get the effective duty rate instantly.

search.placeholder: Enter HS code or product description...
search.noResults: No tariff entries found for your search.
search.selectCountry: Please select an origin country to see the full tariff rate.
search.selectCountryFirst: Please select an origin country first.

tariff.noDuties: No additional duties for this country

disclaimer.text: DutyDash provides tariff rate information for informational purposes only. This is not legal, trade, or customs advice. Actual duty rates may vary. Always consult with a licensed customs broker for official determinations.

validation.hsCodeInvalid: Invalid HS code format. Use digits and dots (e.g., 8471.30)

pwa.installDescription: Add to home screen for quick tariff lookups

common.noData: No tariff data found for this HS code.
common.noResults: No results found. Try a different search term.
